name: RandomService_hexTest
description: Unit tests for the hex generation functionality of the RandomService.

test_cases.name: testHexWithLengthZero
test_cases.description: Tests the hex generation functionality with a length of zero.

test_cases.name: testHexWithPositiveLengthUppercase
test_cases.description: Tests the hex generation functionality with a positive length and uppercase.

test_cases.name: testHexWithPositiveLengthLowercase
test_cases.description: Tests the hex generation functionality with a positive length and lowercase.

test_cases.name: testHexWithCustomRandom
test_cases.description: Tests the hex generation functionality with a custom Random instance.
